p: Trump is a modern‐day McCarthy, thriving on lies and innuendos. On 9 June 2020, he tweeted that Martin Gugino, the 75‐year‐old man who fell on his head and started bleeding from his ear after being pushed by a policeman, ‘could be an ANTIFA provocateur’ trying to block out police communications. That he had fallen harder than he was pushed was described as being a ‘set‐up’. Trump got this totally baseless conspiracy theory from a far‐right cable news channel that had aired false information in the past. Gugino is a long‐time peace activist ‘involved in a range of political issues, including immigration, climate justice, prisoners’ rights, economic justice, and homelessness’ (Nashrulla 2020).
